gain_db.description: RX Gain in dB. Valid range for B200/B210 is 0-76 dB.

duration_sec.description: Capture duration in seconds for each frequency step.

bandwidth_hz.description: Instantaneous bandwidth in Hz, which also defines the sweep step size. Max for B200/B210 is 56 MHz.

start_freq_hz.description: Sweep start frequency in Hz. B200/B210 range is 70 MHz to 6 GHz.

end_freq_hz.description: Sweep end frequency in Hz. Must be >= start_freq_hz.

sample_interval.description: Time in seconds between the start of consecutive captures.
